title: Modern logo font - Any ideas pls?
content:
Hi, please could someone help me out with the name of this font please?

Many thanks in advance

Cheers  
Simon

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [slide.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090510225733/http:/typophile.com/files/slide.jpg) | 30.89 KB |
author: SiMar

comments.content:
There are so many of these fonts ’cause they’re so easy to make.  
In this case, since it’s a logo, I guess it’s custom.

Thanks a lot Jan

if this is indeed custom do you or anyone help with any base fonts I could use that are close or similar and which I can customize myself if need be?

Cheers

For techno fonts like this my advice is to search at Dafont, in the Techno\>Sci-Fi category. It seems like 80-90% of the vague techno font questions turn up there (the exceptions are the better known commercial techno fonts), but when your post doesn’t immediately ring any bells, it often means it’s one of the countless ’hobby’ (free) fonts that are so easy to make, as Jan said.

- Mike Yanega

Okay, cheers Mike - Youre right, I’ll go and have a look over at DaFont

Thanks for your advice

Simon
